name: UndeadRiderVR
description:
UndeadRider for the HTC Vive, made in 7 days for the VR jam 2017. You are the UndeadRider, so ride, ride, rideee!

Instructions:

- put a chair in the middle of the room, sit and play.

- Touch the Start button on the bike to start the engine.

- Lean left and right to steer.
